description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=1/3. Survive through 9 intense levels, including 3 epic boss fights ! each level is available in 4 difficulty modes ! Replays of your best performances in each level/difficulty are automatically saved and reviewable ! Also contains replays of each level on Hard difficulty to watch and learn from !
